Table 5 Crystallographic data for FcPO32−2Na+·5H2O
The confidence factors RF and wRF have been defined for all reflections (1) and for observed reflections (2). RF = ∑|Fo − Fc|/∑Fo, wRF = [w(Fo − Fc)2/∑wFo2]1/2, where Fo is the observed structure factor amplitude, Fc the calculated structure factor amplitude, w = 1/σ2, and σ the estimated standard deviation as defined in the ESI.

Formula weight 400.06
System Monoclinic

c/Å 15.383(1)
β/° 92.51(1)
V/Å3 1540.92(20)

λ/Å 0.710730
µ/cm−1 1.173
D c/ g cm−3 1.724
T/K 173
Total no. reflections measured 5079
Total no. independent reflections (I > 2σ(I)) 3193
R int 0.088
R F (1) 0.059
R F (2) 0.0328
wR F (1) 0.0373
wR F (2) 0.0326
Δρmax, min/e Å−3 0.54/−0.440
